group_1.textRight: I'm done setting the gems here. @West Oogibashi is done, too.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks. Now we're all set.
The magical energy in these gems will make @Ryuugasaki think we're in two places at once.

group_1.textRight: Since we put gems on the east and west bridges,
are we expecting them to come in through @Monzenbashi?

group_1.textLeft: The magical energy in these gems will make @Ryuugasaki think we're in two places at once.

group_1.textRight: But won't that mean we have to take them head-on there...?

group_1.textLeft: If we show Juri we're afraid of her, she'll get more aggressive.
The more time passes, the bolder she'll get.
So taking her head-on from the start is our best bet.
Plus, Ryuugasaki has been silent for the past few @days....
If they're giving us time, we should make @the most of it.

group_1.textRight: Juri being inactive concerns me a little, though.
We expected her to go on the attack the day she declared war, and we've been waiting for it @ever since...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... That concerns me, too...
What is it?

group_1.textRight: We caught someone trying to steal Grief Seeds.

group_1.textLeft: Who caught them?

group_1.textRight: Hikaru did.

group_1.textLeft: ...Got it. I'll be right over. Just don't let the thief get away.
Where's that Magical Girl from?

group_1.textRight: She says she's from Ryuugasaki.

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru, fill me in on what happened.

group_1.textRight: Sure!
After you told me to keep an eye on the Seeds,
I hid and kept a close eye on the Grief Seeds here.
That's when that girl showed up and put the Seeds @into her bag.
So I jumped out and caught her red-handed.

group_1.textLeft: So, she broke in while we were all out, @huh...
Why did she do that?

group_1.textRight: Well...
She said the tension with our standoff had darkened her Soul Gem.
So she got scared and wanted to cleanse it...

group_1.textLeft: I see...

group_1.textRight: Yuna, I want you to forgive her...
I can understand what she's going through...

group_1.textLeft: You're a kind girl, Hikaru.
But it's because of the situation we're in @that I can't just let it slide.
Would you let me speak with her in private @for a bit...?

group_1.textRight: Of course...

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102200:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Y-Yes!?

group_1.textLeft: You've earned my trust.
Why did you do this? I want to hear it from you @directly.

group_1.textRight: It's what... um... Hikaru... I mean... it's exactly what Hikaru told you...!
I was panicking over the war and was desperate for Grief Seeds...
Please, Yuna... forgive me...

group_1.textLeft: What you did is unforgivable.
What you did is the same as taking another girl's life. @Do you realize that?

group_1.textRight: [chara:770082:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!?

group_1.textLeft: Are you prepared for what comes next?

group_1.textRight: No... don't kill me...!

group_1.textLeft: Don't misunderstand me, okay?
What I'm asking is, are you ready to devote your life @to Torayamachi?

group_1.textRight: Yes... Yes... of course...!

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll forgive you.

group_1.textRight: Thank you so mu-

group_1.textLeft: If you tell me the truth.

group_1.textRight: [chara:770082:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!?

group_1.textLeft: Heh.
Nevermind, you don't have to.

group_1.textRight: Huh...?

group_1.textLeft: I can see it on your face.
